mapper.select: select station_name AS stationName from t_pm25 a where a.id=#{id}

select p.id AS "id", p.station_id AS "stationId", p.station_name AS "stationName", p.station_dic AS "stationDic", p.city_id AS "cityId", p.lon AS "lon", p.lat AS "lat", p.pm25 AS "pm25", p.pm10 AS "pm10", p.co AS "co", p.no2 AS "no2", p.o3 AS "o3", p.so2 AS "so2", p.create_time AS "createTime" from t_pm25 p where p.station_dic=#{dic} and DATE_FORMAT(p.create_time,'%Y%m%d%H')=#{createTime}
